::Skullgrin/Symphony::

Skullgrin heard Megatron's voice.  Weak and slowly losing the small quantity
of energy he had, he began crawling toward's Megatron.

"Mega....tron.........Decep....ticons....................Forever....." he
said, as he kept crawling closer.

He tried to grab for Megatron's foot.

"Get.....me out....of here....." Skullgrin begged.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Symphony watched as Skullgrin crawled towards Megatron.  Symphony was now as
nervous as he'd ever been, due to his deal with the Decepticons.  He didn't
know what he should do in front of the Decepticon leader.  He decided not to
reveal his true colours yet.....He would wait for a better
opportunity.......
